title: Power - resistor uses 320 J in 8 s at 2 A

content.question: A resistor carrying <math alttext="2 amperes" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>A</mtext></math> of current dissipates <math alttext="320 joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>320</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>J</mtext></math> of energy in <math alttext="8 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>. What is the resistance of the resistor?

choices.label: <math alttext="10 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="20 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="40 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>40</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="80 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>80</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="10 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
